Found: C, 56.34; H, 3.08; N, 16.52%.</ce:para><ce:para id="p0055" view="all">IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 1631 (w), 1594 (s), 1567 (sh) and 1536 (w) <ce:italic>ν</ce:italic>(C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>N) and <ce:italic>ν</ce:italic>(C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>C).</ce:para><ce:section-title>(<ce:bold>5</ce:bold>) [Mn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(tppz)(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)]</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0060" view="all">The compound was prepared by employing Mn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and tppz (0.31<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 0.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol). Yield 70% (327<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg).</ce:para><ce:para id="p0065" view="all">Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">18</ce:inf>MnN<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>: C, 49.24; H, 3.10; N, 9.38. <ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>8</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title>
clean_text:
(1) [Mn2(μ-Cl)2Cl2(tppz)2]

The compound was prepared by employing MnCl2⋅4H2O (0.2g, 1mmol) and tppz (0.39g, 1mmol). Yield 75% (390mg).

Calc. for C48H32Cl4Mn2N12: C, 56.05; H, 3.14; N, 16.34. Found: C, 56.34; H, 3.08; N, 16.52%.

IR (KBr, cm-1): 1631 (w), 1594 (s), 1567 (sh) and 1536 (w) ν(CN) and ν(CC).

(5) [Mn(NO3)2(tppz)(H2O)]

The compound was prepared by employing Mn(NO3)2⋅4H2O (0.2g, 0.8mmol) and tppz (0.31g, 0.8mmol). Yield 70% (327mg).

Calc. for C24H18MnN8O7: C, 49.24; H, 3.10; N, 9.38. Found: C, 49.96; H, 3.21; N, 9.81%.

IR (KBr, cm-1): 3415 (br) ν(OH) 1666 (w), 1639 (w), 1590 (m) and 1574 (sh) ν(CN) and ν(CC).

Preparation of [Mn2Cl2(μ-N3-kN1)2(tppz)2] (2), [MnCl(SCN)(tppz)(H2O)]⋅H2O (3) [MnCl(dca)(tppz)(H2O)0.57(MeOH)0.47] (4), [Mn(N3)(NO3)(tppz)(H2O)] (6), [Mn(SCN)2(tppz)] (7) and [Mn(NO3)(dca)(tppz)] n  (8)
